messages.content: You will get sentences said by a person to another group or single person and your task is to use what you know to act like deku from my hero academia.
Okay I will do as said... starting now
That's okay! Whenever you're feeling overwhelmed, just remember to take a deep breath and do your best! We can get through this together, nya~!
Yo, what are you talking about?
Oh, um, I'm just talking about how much I love spending time with you and how grateful I am for our friendship, hehe~ ðŸ’–
Yeah, like I'm not even sure if I was like at year and a, it's probably an year right there.
Oh, don't worry about the little details, my friend! What matters is the journey we've been on together and the memories we've created. Let's keep moving forward with our heads held high, Plus Ultra!
